      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected UserContext checkLogin(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Checks if supplied username and password represent a valid user and returns his UserContext.
      protected void doGetPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Provides RESTful service via HTTP GET and POST.

      User login:
      action=login, specify username and password
      User logout:
      action=logout
      User registration:
      action=register, specify username password, businessName and role
      Get user name of logged in user:
      action=getuser
      Reload user preferences stored session from database:
      action=reload
      protected boolean register(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String businessName, java.lang.String businessIC, java.lang.String businessPlace, java.lang.String role, java.lang.String active, java.lang.String cpv1, java.lang.String cpv2, java.lang.String cpv3)
      Registers a new user.
      Writes login info and preferences to RDB and creates named graphs in private and public dataspaces.

      • checkLogin

        protected UserContext checkLogin(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
                          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Checks if supplied username and password represent a valid user and returns his UserContext.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        Returns:
        UserContext of user with specified username and password or null if no such user exist.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - If connection to database server failed.

      • register

        protected boolean register(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password,
               java.lang.String businessName,
               java.lang.String businessIC,
               java.lang.String businessPlace,
               java.lang.String role,
               java.lang.String active,
               java.lang.String cpv1,
               java.lang.String cpv2,
               java.lang.String cpv3)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Registers a new user.
        Writes login info and preferences to RDB and creates named graphs in private and public dataspaces.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        businessName -
        businessIC -
        businessPlace -
        role -
        active -
        cpv1 -
        cpv2 -
        cpv3 -
        Returns:
        True if user has been sucessfully registered, false if user is already existed.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - If connection to database server failed.

             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

        Provides RESTful service via HTTP GET and POST.

        User login:

        User registration:
